name: i!
description:
Ian and Nai are two siblings who are strenuously searching for each other. They seem to be isolated in two very different worlds. But why? What are these worlds? What's behind their story? Play "i!" to find out!

What is "i!" ?

"i!" is a double-input platformer with a moving story to discover. Use both your hands to control Ian and Nai at the same time, for a very challenging experience that will split your brain in two!

"i!" features also an endless run mode that keeps track of your high score, a story mode with beautiful cutscenes, a level selection (to skip cutscenes) and a gallery where you can (re)watch the cutscenes.

GGJ 2022

"i!" was made for the Global Game Jam 2022, where the theme was "Duality". It presents duality in the game input, in the level design and in the aesthetics (with the white vs black, and the mixture of a traditional art style and pixel art style).

The team

Alessandro Ampala - @drom1x: Audio & Graphic
Alessandro Carattoli - @artorias93: Programming & UI Design
Michele Piccolini - @mujina93: Programming & Narrative Design
Andrea Squillante - @DreWolf25: Programming & Level Design
Giulia Colombo - @g_ivanov: Concept Art & 2D Art
Ahmed Mohammed - @nerdingfreak: Pixel Art & 2D Art
Claudio Francioso - @claudiofrancioso: Composing & Sound Design
Mattia Ceci - @dymitrius: Game Producing & Quality Assurance
